title: Headings
description:
Hierarchy refers to the difference in type size and weight between text elements. A successful hierarchy establishes the order of importance of elements on a page, allowing readers to easily scan content and find what theyâ€™re looking for.

This page is under active development. Information is being moved into it from these pages:
